1370: Gertrudis moved to Lange gracht.C.3 after marriage.
Got married to Wellinus at age 20 in 1370.
1372: Gave birth to Scilla in 1372 at age 22.
1375: Gave birth to Brundonis in 1375 at age 25.
1376: Gave birth to Gherbaren in 1376 at age 26.
1379: Gave birth to Ghodelde in 1379 at age 29.
1381: Gave birth to Blomart in 1381 at age 31.
Lost son Gherbaren when Gherbaren was 6 years old.
1386: Lost son Nannekin when Nannekin was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Nannekin in 1386 at age 36.
1388: Gave birth to Blankard in 1388 at age 38.
Lost son Blankard when Blankard was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1389: Gave birth to Ymmekine in 1389 at age 39.
1396: Lost son Blomart when Blomart was 16 years old.
1398: Lost daughter Scilla when Scilla was 27 years old.
